full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BAR DO 'JIGS SKYOBS MA'I SMON LAM DANG BAR DO DRUG GI RTZA TSIG 'PHRAD SGROL GYI SMON LAM ZAB CHOS ZHI KHRO DGONGS PA RANG GROL LAS, SANGS RGYAS DANG BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' RNAMS RAM DAR SPRAN PA'I SMON LAM BZHUGS, ,
